availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hamilton County, Ohio, laborer. Native of Prussia. Son of Peter Ackerman and Maria Brausch Ackerman. Signed a petition to Beriah Magoffin on behalf of William A Clark in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on April 29, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 11, p. 623A.
Saarland, Germany, Births, Marriages, and Deaths, 1776-1875, Besseringen, 1840, p. 24 of 217 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
